Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLListView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.ListView
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.app.ECListView
                           |
                           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLListView
public class SLListView
extends ECListView
Subclass of ListView that applies the stone-texture look.

SLListView()
Overridden to set some aspects of the stone-texture look

drawView(Graphics)
Overridden to draw background image, if any.
drawViewBackground(Graphics, int, int, int, int)
Overridden to do nothing at all when there's a background image, since drawView handles the background image.
getBackgroundImage()
Returns the background image, which is tiled across the bounds of the list view.
setBackgroundImage(Image)
Sets the background image.

SLListView 
  public SLListView()
Overridden to set some aspects of the stone-texture look

drawView 
  public void drawView(Graphics g)
Overridden to draw background image, if any.
Overrides:
drawView in class ListView
drawViewBackground 
  public void drawViewBackground(Graphics g,
                                 int x,
                                 int y,
                                 int width,
                                 int height)
Overridden to do nothing at all when there's a background image, since drawView handles the background image.
Overrides:
drawViewBackground in class ListView
getBackgroundImage 
  public Image getBackgroundImage()
Returns the background image, which is tiled across the bounds of the list view.
setBackgroundImage 
  public void setBackgroundImage(Image newImage)
Sets the background image. Call this with null to make the background be a solid color.
See Also:
getBackgroundImage
